verses.verse: A Prayer <S%H8605><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%> Hear <S%H8085><s%> the right, <S%H6664><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> attend <S%H7181><s%> to my cry, <S%H7440><s%> give ear <S%H238><s%> to my prayer, <S%H8605><s%> that goes not out of feigned <S%H4820><s%> lips. <S%H8193><s%>
Let my sentence <S%H4941><s%> come <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> from your presence; <S%H6440><s%> let your eyes <S%H5869><s%> behold <S%H2372><s%> the things that are equal. <S%H4339><s%>

You have proved <S%H974><s%> my heart; <S%H3820><s%> you have visited <S%H6485><s%> me in the night; <S%H3915><s%> you have tried <S%H6884><s%> me, and shall find <S%H4672><s%> nothing; <S%H1077><s%> I am purposed <S%H2161><s%> that my mouth <S%H6310><s%> shall not transgress. <S%H5674><s%>
Concerning the works <S%H6468><s%> of men, <S%H120><s%> by the word <S%H1697><s%> of your lips <S%H8193><s%> I have kept <S%H8104><s%> me from the paths <S%H734><s%> of the destroyer. <S%H6530><s%>
Hold <S%H8551><s%> up my goings <S%H838><s%> in your paths, <S%H4570><s%> that my footsteps <S%H6471><s%> slip <S%H4131><s%> not.
I have called <S%H7121><s%> on you, for you will hear <S%H6030><s%> me, O God: <S%H410><s%> incline <S%H5186><s%> your ear <S%H241><s%> to me, and hear <S%H8085><s%> my speech. <S%H565><s%>

Show your marvelous <S%H6395><s%> loving kindness, <S%H2617><s%> O you that save <S%H3467><s%> by your right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> them which put their trust <S%H2620><s%> in you from those that rise <S%H6965><s%> up against them.
Keep <S%H8104><s%> me as the apple <S%H380><s%> <S%H1323><s%> of the eye, <S%H5869><s%> hide <S%H5641><s%> me under the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of your wings, <S%H3671><s%>
From the wicked <S%H7563><s%> that oppress <S%H7703><s%> me, from my deadly <S%H5315><s%> enemies, <S%H341><s%> who compass <S%H5362><s%> me about.
They are enclosed <S%H5462><s%> in their own fat: <S%H2459><s%> with their mouth <S%H6310><s%> they speak <S%H1696><s%> proudly. <S%H1348><s%>

They have now <S%H6258><s%> compassed <S%H5437><s%> us in our steps: <S%H838><s%> they have set <S%H7896><s%> their eyes <S%H5869><s%> bowing <S%H5186><s%> down <S%H5186><s%> to the earth; <S%H776><s%>

Like <S%H1825><s%> as a lion <S%H738><s%> that is greedy <S%H3700><s%> of his prey, <S%H2963><s%> and as it were a young <S%H3715><s%> lion <S%H3715><s%> lurking <S%H3427><s%> in secret <S%H4565><s%> places.

Arise, <S%H6965><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> disappoint <S%H6923><s%> him, cast <S%H3766><s%> him down: <S%H3766><s%> deliver <S%H6403><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> from the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> which is your sword: <S%H2719><s%>

From men <S%H4962><s%> which are your hand, <S%H3027><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> from men <S%H4962><s%> of the world, <S%H2465><s%> which have their portion <S%H2506><s%> in this life, <S%H2416><s%> and whose belly <S%H990><s%> you fill <S%H4390><s%> with your hid <S%H6845><s%> treasure: they are full <S%H7646><s%> of children, <S%H1121><s%> and leave <S%H5117><s%> the rest <S%H3499><s%> of their substance to their babes. <S%H5768><s%>
As for me, I will behold <S%H2372><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> in righteousness: <S%H6664><s%> I shall be satisfied, <S%H7646><s%> when I awake, <S%H6974><s%> with your likeness. <S%H8544><s%>
